title: The performance and mechanism of persulfate activated by CuFe-LDHs for ofloxacin degradation in water
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00370E, Paper
Xue Zhang, Kang Zhang, Ting Li, Yujiao Wang, Yin Xu
Cu–Fe bimetallic synergy plays an important role in the generation of SO4·−.
